content: materials needed worsted weight yarn j/6 00mm hook tapestry needle and scissors measuring tape stitch markers the sweater is a pullover style your dog should be comfortable with putting the sweater over their head and putting their legs through the holes be sure to match gauge when making the sizes you will find a tutorial included with the pattern for a custom fit the measurements below will help you determine which size to make according to your dog s measurements size - neck / chest / length xs - 9 / 15 / 10 s - 11 / 18 / 12 m - 13 / 22 / 16 l - 17 / 28 / 20 xl - 22 / 34 / 24
